text: "Don't Get Me Wrong" is a 1986 song by British band The Pretenders and is the leading single from their fourth studio album Get Close. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom and the United States, number 4 in Ireland, number 8 in Australia and Belgium, number 14 in Canada and number 11 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:The Pretenders songs
title: Don't Get Me Wrong
